welcome.data: Prompt: “Have you ever seen a row of boxes on a website suddenly stack vertically when the screen size changes? What do you think causes that behavior?” Students reflect and share.

aim.data: Objective: Explore `flex-wrap`, `flex-direction`, and alignment tricks in Flexbox to build responsive layouts.

review.data: Review basic Flexbox: `display: flex`, `justify-content`, `align-items`. Discuss behavior when items overflow the row.

relevant.data: Live demo in WebStorm showing how `flex-wrap`, `flex-direction`, and alignment techniques work in real scenarios.

interactive.data: Students build a four-box feature grid layout that wraps responsively, using `flex-wrap`, `flex-basis`, and alignment tricks.

ownership.data: Students recreate a real-world layout using advanced Flexbox features, adding at least one alignment trick and nested flex.

resonate.data: Exit ticket: What layout problem did you solve today with Flexbox?

supplies.data: Computers with WebStorm, internet, access to https://flexboxfroggy.com, GitHub for submissions
